abstract: Michigan officials reveal over 10,000 backlogged evidence kits from sexual assault investigations discovered 6 years ago, were tested leading to thousands of leads in criminal cases and 21 convictions.
lead_paragraph: Six years after more than 11,000 untested evidence kits from sexual assault investigations were discovered in a Detroit police warehouse, that backlog has been nearly eliminated.

headline.main: Michigan: Backlog of Sex Assault Kits Almost Gone
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Backlog of Sex Assault Kits Almost Gone

snippet: Six years after more than 11,000 untested evidence kits from sexual assault investigations were discovered in a Detroit police warehouse, that backlog has been nearly eliminated.
